channel.title: Comments on: About Me
channel.description: One for the money, two for the show...

item.title: By: Alex Barrett
item.dc:creator: Alex Barrett
item.description: Hi Justin, I am a reporter covering enterprise servers for TechTarget. I saw your tweet about SPARC T3 servers today and would love to ask you a few questions. Can you please email me at abarrett@techtarget.com if you're available? Thanks, alex
item.content:encoded:
Hi Justin,
I am a reporter covering enterprise servers for TechTarget. I saw your tweet about SPARC T3 servers today and would love to ask you a few questions. Can you please email me at abarrett@techtarget.com if you’re available? Thanks, alex

item.title: By: Chris Sears
item.dc:creator: Chris Sears
item.description:
I really like your wallpaper of the mountaineer. Can you share?
coinmaster2000@juno.com
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
I really like your wallpaper of the mountaineer. Can you share?
